description.value:
Oozes are immune to the following effects, unless the effect specifies that it works against oozes.

  • Critical hits, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, polymorph, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning}.
  • Gaze abilities, illusions, visual effects, and other attacks that rely on sight.
  • Flankingâ€”oozes are unflankable.

Format: Immunities ooze immunities.
